mapper.insert: insert into DOC_FILE (ID, FILE_NAME, URL, UPLOADER_ID, UPLOAD_TIME, REMARKS, MODIFY_TIME, UPLOAD_DEPT_ID, UPLOADER_NAME, UPLOAD_DEPT_NAME, EXTENSION_NAME, FILE_PINYIN, FILE_PY, FOLDER_ID, UPLOADER_PINYIN, UPLOADER_PY) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uploaderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uploadTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{uploadDeptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uploaderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uploadDeptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extensionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filePinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filePy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{folderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uploaderPinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uploaderPy,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update DOC_FILE set FILE_NAME = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, URL = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPLOADER_ID = #{uploaderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPLOAD_TIME = #{uploadTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPLOAD_DEPT_ID = #{uploadDeptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPLOADER_NAME = #{uploaderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPLOAD_DEPT_NAME = #{uploadDeptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXTENSION_NAME = #{extensionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILE_PINYIN = #{filePinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILE_PY = #{filePy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FOLDER_ID = #{folderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPLOADER_PINYIN = #{uploaderPinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPLOADER_PY = #{uploaderPy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, FILE_NAME, URL, UPLOADER_ID, UPLOAD_TIME, REMARKS, MODIFY_TIME, UPLOAD_DEPT_ID, UPLOADER_NAME, UPLOAD_DEPT_NAME, EXTENSION_NAME, FILE_PINYIN, FILE_PY, FOLDER_ID, UPLOADER_PINYIN, UPLOADER_PY from DOC_FILE where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ID, FILE_NAME, URL, UPLOADER_ID, UPLOAD_TIME, REMARKS, MODIFY_TIME, UPLOAD_DEPT_ID, UPLOADER_NAME, UPLOAD_DEPT_NAME, EXTENSION_NAME, FILE_PINYIN, FILE_PY, FOLDER_ID, UPLOADER_PINYIN, UPLOADER_PY from DOC_FILE
